% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	G &&&& {G'} \\
	&& {\img(\varphi)} \\
	\\
	&& {G/\ker(\varphi)}
	\arrow["\varphi", from=1-1, to=1-5]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[tail, from=2-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\varphi'}"', from=4-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\widetilde{\varphi}}"{description}, dashed, from=2-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}\]
